name: Gazmo IV Classique
description:
Introducing the Gazmo IV Classique: an ancient TV game system that never was,
featuring four games never released in the early 1970s. Accurately simulated, warts
and all, in glorious Monochromatique CRTVision, you can at last enjoy these new
old games only now revealed in all their fictitious reality.

                    • Rally: How long can you rally playing on both sides of the net?
                    • Bulldog: Be the ball. Dodge the bats.
                    • Keeper: How many penalty shots can you stop?
                    • Dodger: Avoid hitting balls for high score!

Don't forget to turn on the console first!

(Oh - and I ought to mention that if you want to get back to the console from a game,
just left-click near the top of the faux screen.)

Find out more about the making of the Gazmo IV Classique here...
http://garypenn.tumblr.com/post/78639587527/histor...
